name: .WRL File Extension
summary: Learn about .WRL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Virtual world created in VRML - the Virtual Reality Modeling Language; can be navigated in three dimensions; contains coordinates and colors that define each object and shape; also includes the viewpoint coordinates for the initial view of the 3D scene.

content: WRL files are saved in an ASCII text format, which can be edited with a text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
